1.name: Salvaged Leather Armor
1.description: A patchwork armor made from salvaged leather scraps, providing basic protection against both the environment and hostile encounters.

2.name: Riot Shield Suit
2.description: A bulky suit made from scavenged riot shields and reinforced plastic, offering high defense against physical and energy attacks but limiting mobility.

3.name: Tactical Hazmat Suit
3.description: A protective suit designed for hazardous environments, offering moderate defense against radiation, toxic gases, and physical attacks.

4.name: Scrap Metal Armor
4.description: A heavy, makeshift armor pieced together from scraps of metal. Extremely durable but very heavy, limiting speed and stamina.

5.name: Energy-Resistant Combat Suit
5.description: A futuristic combat suit with energy resistance, designed to deflect energy weapons. Provides high defense but requires constant power.

6.name: Wasteland Raider Armor
6.description: Rough, scavenged armor worn by raiders in the wasteland. Made from a mix of leather and metal plates, offering good protection without sacrificing too much agility.
